name: GUILT
description:
Warning.... This game contains Jumpscare, Psychological Atmosphere, Flickering Light, Loud Sound.
You're Jhon. Just a normal family. A few days ago your wife gone missing. You trying to find your wife ALONE but the result is nihil.
You decide to leave the house and buying a new one to escape from your sadnes. But you didn't relize there's something amiss in your house.



Note: GUILT is survival horror game that you trying find an item to solve the puzzle while get
"Chased" and loop scene.
Each of loop become more dark and more puzzle. The clue for survive is hearing. "Chaser" always know where you are. Stay away from the "Chaser".
And find the truth of the situation on "WHY" this happen. This game only support on Keyboard and Mouse.
Features :
    *The enemy always know where you are so listen carefully with her step
    *Find an item and solve the puzzle while get "Chased"
    *Keyboard and Mouse only
    *Headphones Recommends
    *Warning Contain Flickering Light
    *Survival puzzle game
    *Graphical choise : LOW, Med, High
    *various resolutions Windowed or Full Screen
    *This game use AutoSave
    *If Your PC Below 5000 Score Benchmark Use GuiltLow for better Performance (Low Resolution)
